Class Keyboard

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Keyboard
extends Device
    Represents a keyboard.

    1.0.0

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

    • Method Detail

      • type

        public static final void type(java.lang.String text)
        Uses the Robot class to type the given text. Only works for simple letters with upper and lower case and a period.
        Parameters:
        text - a text
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • type

        public static final void type(int key)
        Uses the Robot class to type the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • press

        public static final void press(int key)
        Uses the Robot class to press and hold a key. Don't forget to call release(int).
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • release

        public static final void release(int key)
        Releases a key that is held down by the press(int) method.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getKeyboardListeners

        public java.util.List<KeyboardListener> getKeyboardListeners()
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of all KeyboardListeners that are attached to this keyboard
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • isKeyDown

        public boolean isKeyDown(int key)
        Parameters:
        key - the key code
        Returns:
        true if the key with the corresponding key code is currently down, else false
        Since:
